message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds $1200000, but I am willing to consider your offer to make this acquisition possible for you. To start our conversation, I am offering the product at a price of $1500000. I understand that the value of this product may be subjective to you, so let's discuss what makes this product special to you and how we might reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Looking forward to exploring the possibilities together.
